snippet: Forensic tests have confirmed that a human head found in a large Montreal park is that of a Chinese student whose killing and dismemberment was filmed and posted online.
abstract: Forensic tests confirm that a human head found in a Montreal park is that of a Chinese student whose killing and dismemberment was filmed and posted online; police have said that the victim, Jun Lin, was killed by Luka Rocco Magnotta, who has pleaded not guilty.
lead_paragraph: Forensic tests have confirmed that a human head found in a large Montreal park is that of a Chinese student whose killing and dismemberment was filmed and posted online.

headline.main: Canada: Head Found in Montreal Belonged to Dismembered Student
headline.print_headline: Canada: Head Found in Montreal Belonged to Dismembered Student
